venue.address_2: Potpouri Plaza- across the street from stop n shop
venue.name: Snowtide Informatics

item.description:
Note: WMassDevs' meetings are listed on the calendar as a service, but it is a separate entity. If you want to attend a meeting, please check out their website and join their mailing list. RSVPs should be done there but you can RSVP here to see who else from this group is going or if you want to arrange carpools, etc



The Western MA Developers Group is an informal group of local software developers that meet every other Wednesday for food and tech chat. People in the group come from a variety backgrounds (desktop software, web development, microcontrollers, etc) and languages (Python, Java, PHP, C++, Clojure, .NET langs, etc). Talk ranges from job war stories and programming topics to movies, gadgets, phone apps and whatever else people want to talk about.

Note: The location may change based on the level of attendance, so always check the mailing list first.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Western Mass Developers Group
